verbs.description: [ARG0: US President Donald Trump] [V: took] [ARG1: aim] [ARG2: at two of America 's closest allies] [ARGM-LOC: in a speech at the NRA convention] , [ARGM-ADV: saying strict gun laws failed to prevent the 2015 terrorist attacks in Paris and highlighting a purported increase in knife violence in London] .
